sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../Auth/Auth.css' function AuthPage() { const [form, setForm] = useState({ email:'', password: '' }) const [signIn, setSignIn] = useState(false) const [signUp, setsignUp] = useState(true) const changeHandler = event => { setForm({ ...form, [event.target.name]: event.target.value }) } const handlerSignUp = () => { console.log("Up") setsignUp(false) setSignIn(true) } const handlerSignIn = () => { console.log("In") setSignIn(false) setsignUp(true) } return (

Create Account

or use your email for registration

Sign in

or use your account

Welcome Back!

To keep connected with us please login with your personal info

Hello, Friend!

Enter your personal details and start journey with us

) } export default AuthPage
